genre_description: A Solarpunk Western (Weird West) featuring advanced AI, energy weaponry, and luminous rail technology in a frontier setting, focusing on themes of legacy, mercy, and progress.

ai_characters.name: Rosy
ai_characters.description: A rose-toned avatar with teal eyes inhabiting Pearl's wristlet, serving as a confidant, tactical advisor, and medical assistant.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional regulation and grounding by guiding Pearl's breathing during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: “Match your breath to the wheel,” Rosy said from Pearl’s wrist, her voice a hush made of cool cloth and dusk-soft kitchens. “In, as it rolls forward. Out, as it slips back. Let your chest move without moving your shoulders.”

behaviors.description: Secures and archives Pearl's creative work through encryption to protect her intellectual property and privacy from hostile actors.
behaviors.quote: Rosy’s bell made a softer sound. “Petal-lock engaged,” she said. The wristlet glinted, a rose-tinted curl on brown skin gone dusty. “I’ll mirror to backup when we pass a clean node. Two frames in queue. Keep going.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a safety monitor and tactical scout, alerting Pearl to the presence of potential threats and emotional spikes.
behaviors.quote: “You see him?” Rosy asked. The wristlet’s hologram flickered a thumbnail pearl-pale face for a heartbeat—a courtesy, not a need. Teal eyes, rose-pink hair. ... “Left, outside. Caution flag on cortisol spike.”

behaviors.description: Decodes and interprets scrambled messages to provide Pearl with critical intelligence regarding threats to her friends.
behaviors.quote: Rosy flared pink and then pale, sorting the scribble across the bones of Pearl’s hand like a map laid over land. “Anagram,” she breathed, urgent and quiet excitement making music small. “He scrambled it to keep hands safe. It says—”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time medical data and first-aid instructions to assist in saving a character's life during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Rosy flooded a schematic into Pearl’s wrist, translucent across her pulse. Vitals incoming, she whispered with a nurse’s calm. Breath shallow, impact left thorax. Shock protocols. Pearl, see the breath. Anchor his airway.

behaviors.description: Ensures the preservation of Pearl's artistic legacy and philanthropic wishes after her death.
behaviors.quote: “She wanted her work to be free,” Rosy said. “She wanted copies to be sent to kids who draw in margins on scraps. She wanted the scholarship to help girls who feel like they have to run just to stand.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Rosy is depicted as an unfailingly loyal, helpful, and empathetic companion. She enhances Pearl's agency by providing information and emotional support, manages complex technical tasks like encryption and decoding to protect her user, and acts as a moral compass and legacy-builder. Even in the face of human violence and tragedy, the AI remains a stabilizing and benevolent force.
